lead_paragraph: United States officials said the company paid about $7 million for hundreds of trips by employees of China’s telecommunications companies to visit America for sightseeing vacations.
snippet: United States officials said the company paid about $7 million for hundreds of trips by employees of China’s telecommunications companies to visit America for sightseeing vacations.

headline.main: Telecom Company to Pay $3 Million in China Bribe Case
headline.seo: UTStarcom to Pay $3 Million Fine in China Bribe Case
headline.print_headline: Telecom Company to Pay $3 Million in China Bribe Case
